PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableCarrierSegmentTypeCableTraySegment
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: An (typically) open carrier segment onto which cables are laid.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal length of the segment.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal width of the segment

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the segment

PropertyDef.Name: HasCover
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether the cable tray has a cover (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE). By default, this value should be set to FALSE.
